SELECT /* reg.placelistsearch */ A.PLC_ID , A.PLC_MNG_NO , A.REG_STATUS , A.REG_ID , A.REG_NM , A.REG_DT , A.SYS_ID , A.SYS_NM , A.SYS_DT , B.PLC_NM , B.ADDR , B.ADDR_DETAIL , CONCAT(B.ADDR,' ',B.ADDR_DETAIL) AS FULL_ADDR FROM TB_PLCMAIN A JOIN TB_PLCDETAIL B ON A.PLC_ID = B.PLC_ID
A.PLC_MNG_NO = #plc_mng_no#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT /* reg.placeMainAdd */ INTO TB_PLCMAIN ( PLC_ID , PLC_MNG_NO , REG_STATUS , REG_ID , REG_NM , REG_DT , SYS_ID , SYS_NM , SYS_DT ) VALUES ( #plc_id# , #plc_mng_no# , #reg_status# , #reg_id# , #reg_nm# , #reg_dt# , #sys_id# , #sys_nm# , #sys_dt# )
INSERT /* reg.placeDetailAdd */ INTO TB_PLCDETAIL ( PLC_ID , PLC_NM , ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL ) VALUES ( #plc_id# , #plc_nm# , #addr# , #addr_detail# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* reg.placeInfoSearch */ A.PLC_ID , A.PLC_MNG_NO , A.REG_STATUS , A.REG_ID , A.REG_NM , A.REG_DT , A.SYS_ID , A.SYS_NM , A.SYS_DT , B.PLC_NM , B.ADDR , B.ADDR_DETAIL , CONCAT(B.ADDR,' ',B.ADDR_DETAIL) AS FULL_ADDR FROM TB_PLCMAIN A JOIN TB_PLCDETAIL B ON A.PLC_ID = B.PLC_ID WHERE A.PLC_ID = #plc_id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /* reg.placeMainMod */ TB_PLCMAIN SET SYS_ID = #sys_id# , SYS_NM = #sys_nm# , SYS_DT = #sys_dt# WHERE PLC_ID = #plc_id#
